1   package com.test.vendor.mckoi;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
5   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteMckoiSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteMckoiSuiteIT() {
10  
11          this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:mckoi://127.0.0.1/APP";
12          this.jdbcUser = "user";
13          this.jdbcPass = "password";
14  
15          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "APP";
16          this.jsqlTableName = "pwn";
17          this.jsqlColumnName = "dataz";
18  
19          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "name";
20          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "name";
21          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "column";
22          
23          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select name from SYS_INFO.sUSRSchemaInfo";
24          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "select name from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableInfo where \"schema\" = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"'";
25          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "select \"column\" from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableColumns where \"schema\" = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"' and \"table\" = '"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'";
26          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "select "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" from "+ this.jsqlTableName;
27      }
28  
29      @AfterEach
30      public void checkVendor() {
31          Assertions.assertEquals(
32              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getMckoi(),
33              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
34          );
35      }
36  }
